greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Denominators of the partial sums of the reciprocals of the numbers (k + 1)*(5*k + 3) = A147874(k+2), for k >= 0.
comment: The corresponding numerators are given in A294828. Details are found there.
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..891
formula: a(n) = denominator(V(5,3;n)) with V(5,3;n) = Sum_{k=0..n} 1/((k + 1)*(5*k + 3)) = Sum_{k=0..n} 1/A147874(k+2) = (1/2)*Sum_{k=0..n} (1/(k + 3/5) - 1/(k+1)). For this sum in terms of the digamma function see A294828.
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Nov 16 2017
